body_html: @nbogis this conversation should probably be moved elsewhere, since it's not really relevant to the current PR, but can you double-check that it also looks weird for you on the actual production site (teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org)? I've just tried it with my inspector and everything looks as it should on every device, so I'd say that if it works fine in production we should just drop it? I can also investigate further, but I'd need to do a bit more set up first so it will take a few days I think.
